pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.2: That is, four fingerbreadths. For a discussion of the aṅgula, see Measures in the Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.3: Here I render sugata as “Buddha”, which seems required by the narrative. I do not think, however, that this narrative usage ties our hands in the interpretation of this term. See below.
